PPS - Python Print Server¶

  • Source code

About¶

PPS - Python Print Server is print server with web interface to show information about print jobs. It counts page format, number of pages and other information to user.

Instalation¶

First ensure you habe you need to install python-dev packages

git clone git@github.com:philips558/PPS.git
cd pps
python3 setup.py install
cd PPS/pkpgcounter-3.50
python setup.py install

PPS
